text: John Peter Spyros Sarbanes (born May 22, 1962) is an American politician who was the U.S. Representative for from 2007 to 2025. He is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman John Sarbanes official U.S. House website * John Sarbanes for Congress * * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Maryland Category:Lawyers from Baltimore Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Businesspeople from Baltimore Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: John Sarbanes
